title: Naomi Campbell, 49, flaunts her toned body as she smashes intense gym workout
text:
She's known for her prowess on the runway and being one of the world's most in demand models.

And Naomi Campbell has revealed how she stays in such incredible shape by sharing a video of her tough gym workout on Instagram.

Posting the video on Monday, the 49-year-old supermodel smashed the routine and remained looking glamorous in an all-black ensemble despite the gruelling exercise.

Work it: Naomi Campbell, 49, showed off her toned physique in an impressive workout video filmed at a London gym on Monday

Personal trainer Chase Weber also shared the impressive workout video, writing the caption: 'When Naomi works.. SHE WORKS.'

Naomi wore her raven tresses down and poker straight style as she worked out, which included using a vertical climber and squatting while lifting a weighted bar.

She also lifted dumbbells and trained with battle ropes before running on a treadmill, all without appearing to break a sweat.

Toned: The supermodel wore a practical all black ensemble, including trainers, for the session

The model kept her outfit practical for the session and wore tight gym leggings and a long-sleeved top with a sheer back over another black t-shirt.

It has been a busy few weeks for Naomi and on Tuesday 1 October she attended the launch of The Dior Sessions coffee table book and the after party in London.

The supermodel looked fantastic in a black dress which she paired with a dark, printed jacket.

She added height to her frame with a pair of black ankle boots and completed her look with a pair of sunglasses.

Strength: During the workout Naomi used a vertical climber machine, pictured, and barely appeared to break a sweat

Stamina: Naomi, who has walked hundreds of runways in her modelling career, also lifted a weighted bar at the gym while squatting

Naomi recently attended Paris Fashion Week and also hit the runway herself to walk in the star-studded Saint Laurent SS20 show.

While in the French capital Naomi also went to the Valentino womenswear show, where she donned a long-sleeved white top and matching, full-length trousers.

She also showed off her fashion credentials in a plunging, lace-up top to watch the L'Oréal Paris runway show on September 28.

Commitment: The model wore her locks down and straight for the gym and accessorised with a white watch

Gym session: Last month Naomi attended several runway shows during Paris Fashion Week

The Streatham native enjoyed her trip in Paris, but recently revealed she has previously suffered racism while in Europe.

Brunette beauty Naomi told Paris Match Magazine she wasn't let into a hotel in the south of France after a guard told her it was full, only to discover other guests were being admitted into the facility.

Choosing not to name the hotel, Naomi explained: 'The word "diversity" is everywhere today but it did not exist when I started.'

Results: Ever the professional, Naomi appeared calm and composed during the workout

Pushing it: To finish her workout in London, Naomi ran on a quickly moving inclined treadmill

'I've always wanted people to be treated equally. I was recently in a city in the South of France, where I was invited to participate in an event in a hotel whose name I will not mention.

'They did not want to let my friend and I in because of the colour of my skin. The guy at the entrance pretended that the place was full but he was letting other people in.

'It is for these kinds of revolting moments that I will continue to speak up and make myself heard.'
description: Naomi Campbell has revealed how she stays in such incredible shape by sharing a video of her tough gym workout on Instagram on Monday.
